column4: hi guys, i just installed new nvidia driverse (180.11) and i'm experiencing some color loss
for example, i can see stripes on my background etc...
does anyone know what could be the problem?
are you sure that the new drivers support your videocard?
yes.. i have 3d acceleration
it's like 16bit colors
yes, but as far as i understand, the nvidia drivers only support a certain list of nvidia video cards, need to make sure the card you have is on the list of the 180 drivers
what type of video card do you have?
geforce go 7300
so where can i find that list?
i'm trying to find the right website, are you running hardy or intrepid?
intrepid
check out http://packages.ubuntu.com/intrepid-updates/nvidia-glx-180
and see if it's on the list
just a sec
yep it is supported
do you have nvidia-settings installed?
i thought that this could be compiz-fusion problem but it is still there when i switch to metacity
yes i have
and when you run it, it doesn't give an error, and correctly states the driver?
noup.. seems that everything is working fine
i can post you Xorg.0.log if you want

maybe you're right and it could be compiz, i'm not really that sure, have you tried switching back to metacity to see if there is still the same problem? (metacity --replace), i'm guessing you did seeing how you can see what we're typing
in all honesty i'm not that good, i think you're problem is more than i know how to fix, sorry
